summary: Comprehensive research deliverable for Inventory Forecasting feature completed. Analysis includes: (1) Current state assessment of WMS, sales, and procurement modules with 13 core tables and advanced statistical framework, (2) Gap analysis identifying missing demand forecasting models and accuracy tracking, (3) Forecasting methodology recommendations (moving average, exponential smoothing, Holt-Winters seasonal), (4) Complete database schema design with 4 new tables and 2 materialized views, (5) Backend service architecture (DemandForecastingService, ForecastAccuracyService, ReplenishmentRecommendationService), (6) Frontend dashboard designs with forecast vs actual charts, (7) 6-phase implementation roadmap spanning 11 weeks. The system has strong foundation with existing statistical analysis (V0.0.22), historical data preservation (SCD Type 2), and 100x performance optimization patterns. Expected outcomes: 30% stockout reduction, 15% inventory cost reduction, 25% forecast accuracy improvement. Ready for Marcus (Implementation Lead) to begin Phase 1.
